Ashwin to Johnson, OUT he has missed this one completely! Johnson steps out early to slog it over the leg side but this drifts in and slides through the gap. Dhoni does the rest. Johnson doesn't even look back. Knows he is gone the moment his misses it

Shami to Harris, no run this one cuts in from back of length and smacks Harris on the thigh pad. Wonder if there are going to more of such deliveries once Australia come to bowl
Shami to Harris, FOUR runs oh wow wow! This is almost Sehwag-esque.. Fuller delivery, it is drilled past the bowler with a full swing of the bat.. no feet movement, just quick hands
Shami to Harris, 1 run back of length outside off, Harris calmly chops it down towards third man
Shami to Smith, no run leans forward and punches the length delivery firmly to cover
Shami to Smith, no run gets some inswing on this one, but the batsman punches it firmly to mid-on with the straightest of bats

Ashwin to Smith, 1 run tossed up on off, the batsman comes forward and punches it to long on

Ashwin to Harris, no run he comes forward and defends the tossed up delivery solidly
Ashwin to Harris, FOUR runs flatter and shorter outside off, now he goes behind square.. cuts it behind point for another boundary. Played it very late
Ashwin to Harris, no run tossed up on off stump line, the batsman defends it to the off side
Ashwin to Harris, FOUR runs and another beautiful late cut! This was quicker outside off and he cuts it fine on the off side. Repeat of the shot two balls earlier. It's sure not Watson
Sharma to Smith, 1 run length delivery outside off, the batsman cuts it down to deep point
Sharma to Harris, no run digs this one short and the batsman easily ducks under it

Ashwin to Harris, no run tossed up outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends

Sharma to Harris, 2 leg byes now Harris gets to his half-century! This is flicked down to fine leg. He waited for a while to see if the umpire was going to give it leg byes but no, he takes his helmet off anyway.. he will have his two runs. Well played. Oh no. scratch that. It was a leg bye. Harris was ready with his helmet off but not yet. Belated call for leg bye
Sharma to Harris, no run fuller delivery outside, sliced through to point
Sharma to Harris, no run he comes forward and punches the length delivery to mid-off, no single yet
Sharma to Harris, no run punches this to the off side and wants a single, but the fielder charges in. He will have to wait for his fifty
Ashwin to Smith, 2 runs he steps out of the crease and drives it along the ground, past the non-striker, for a couple of runs to long-off
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run brings Harris on strike with a tuck off his pads to midwicket
Ashwin to Harris, 1 run he brings up his fifty finally! Gets a juicy delivery on the pads and he tucks it to square leg. Celebrates it for the second time
Ashwin to Smith, no run looks to play the reverse sweep but misses out this time, gets hit on the arms
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run flighted on the leg stump line, driven down to deep square leg
Ashwin to Harris, 2 runs here comes the carrom-ball, but this is what happens mostly with it.. it's down the leg side and it's flicked to fine leg
Sharma to Smith, no run bowls a bouncer outside off, the batsman doesn't bother going after it

Sharma to Harris, 1 run he dabs it to cover with soft hands and takes off for a quick single
Sharma to Smith, 1 run the unstoppable Smith gets to 150 with a pull to deep square leg. Loud roar from the crowd now, all up on their feet to applaud the new captain
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run he steps out of the crease and plays a whippy drive down to long on
Ashwin to Harris, 3 runs gets a thick outside edge past the first slip fielder for three more. No stopping the flow of runs
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run stays in the crease and steers it to fine leg for a single, easily done
Ashwin to Harris, 2 runs he moves to the leg side and drives it inside out to wide long-off for more runs.. He is huffing and puffing, Ryan.. has been running a lot in the last few overs
Ashwin to Harris, FOUR runs now avoids the running with a powerful sweep to the fine-leg boundary. Goes down on the knee and slaps it down
Ashwin to Harris, 2 runs on the pads again, tucked away to short fine leg
Sharma to Smith, no run clears his front leg out and looks to blast this over cover, but that flies past the outside edge
Sharma to Smith, 1 run stays in the crease and steers it down to third man. Every run being cheered now

Ashwin to Harris, SIX runs that is mowed over the cow corner! Gets twitchy before the ball is delivered and smacks the advertising hoarding
Ashwin to Harris, OUT and he misses a straight ball to be given out lbw! He went for the big sweep and missed it completely. That would have hit the stumps
Ashwin to Lyon, no run length ball is driven back by Lyon to Ashwin
Ashwin to Lyon, no run flighted ball, spins in a touch, calmly pushed off the front foot to the off side

Ashwin to Smith, SIX runs shot! Steven Smith dances down the track and crashes that over the man at long-on, into the stands it goes, and that is a great way to bring up his highest Test score, what's more that is superbly held by a fan in the stands
Ashwin to Smith, no run watchful defence this time

Ashwin to Lyon, no run down the leg side, off the pads and trickles towards square leg
Yadav to Smith, 2 runs that one just eludes the cover fielder running to his left. That was Pujara there.. a faster man would have probably reached it. It was sliced over the infield
Yadav to Smith, FOUR runs he moves well outside leg and slashes at this short and wide delivery, manages to cut it through backward point
Yadav to Smith, no run looks to hoick this full and wide delivery down to long on but he has moved too far down the leg side, makes no connections

Ashwin to Smith, no run pushed through on the stumps, defended down the pitch
Ashwin to Smith, FOUR runs hammered down the ground! He wasn't to the pitch of the delivery but he punches it over the umpire's head and how hard has he hit that! There was a long on in place too
Ashwin to Smith, no run he is going for the umpire again! Luckily for Dharamsena, Ashwin gets a hand to it
Ashwin to Smith, no run fired down the leg side and Smith is disappointed he didn't get a bat on that
Ashwin to Smith, FOUR runs oh whoa!! He comes down the pitch, the ball is wide and full, but he throws his bat at that and hits it on the full to the cover boundary
Ashwin to Smith, FOUR runs keep them coming! This is a reverse-sweep now to the third-man boundary. This is going to break down India
Yadav to Lyon, no run he comes forward and drives the fuller delivery firmly to mid-off

Yadav to Lyon, 3 runs slapped over cover, and they charge back for the third as it's Pujara there. Lyon makes it back in time with a dive
Yadav to Smith, 2 runs this is a low full toss outside off and Smith slices it down to third man. Dhawan has to dive to his right to stop them from running away to the boundary
Yadav to Smith, no run he gets cramped for room as Umesh fires this short ball on the body, defends it down the pitch
Yadav to Smith, 1 run tucks this one to midwicket for a quick single
Shami to Smith, no run he moves to the leg side and punches the back of length delivery firmly to deep cover
Shami to Smith, 1 run he charges down the pitch and gets a quick bouncer, but that is not going to deter him from playing the hook, plays it from over his head and places it well to deep square leg
Shami to Lyon, FOUR runs whoa!! Lyon goes inside out with a powerful drive and whacks it over wide mid-off for a one-bounce four
Shami to Lyon, no run looks to swing this to the leg side but it comes in a touch, the batsman misses and the ball misses the leg stump
Shami to Lyon, FOUR runs four more! This is flat-batted down to fine-leg. Short ball on the body and Lyon is enjoying the carnage
Shami to Lyon, OUT swings and misses a straight one, that one hits the leg stump. Lyon doesn't really care. He has done the job of rubbing it in.
Yadav to Smith, no run moves to the leg side and chips the length delivery towards long-off, doesn't time it too well
Yadav to Smith, no run back of length delivery on the stumps, he flat bats it down to long on now

Yadav to Smith, OUT he has lost his middle stump! He goes all the way to the off side to play a ramp shot, but misses a straight delivery. It strikes the top of middle stump. To be frank, the bowlers never looked like taking that wicket and it was up to Smith to do something crazy to give it away

3.02 pm Tea What an innings this has been! He was on 192. A few batsmen would have cared about that 200, but Australia's captain cool doesn't. Australia are all our for 530. Imagine where they were at the start of the day - 259 for 5 - and where they have ended up. One would imagine a quick-scoring hour after a team has gone past 450, but Australia played with that intensity all
Mitchell Johnson comes on with the new ball
Johnson to Rahane, no run length delivery outside off, reaches Haddin on the bounce after Rahane has left it alone
Johnson to Rahane, no run plays an expansive drive off a fuller delivery, finds the fielder at cover
Johnson to Rahane, no run length delivery angled away, the batsman leaves it alone with ease
Johnson to Rahane, 3 runs doesn't hold back on the pull shot! He gets a short one and powers it over midwicket, not entirely in control of it and it stops before reaching the boundary
Johnson to Kohli, no run length delivery outside off, Kohli is comparatively more solid, defends it down the pitch
Johnson to Kohli, no run wanted a single as soon as he tapped it, but this is played back straight to the bowler
Harris to Rahane, no run on the line straightaway, gets some away movement outside off too, the batsman leaves it alone
Harris to Rahane, no run gets it to straighten from back of length, Rahane stays back and defends it to gully
Harris to Rahane, no run nice shape on this fuller delivery, this is wider outside off, left alone

Harris to Rahane, no run decent pace as he shoots this down the channel outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
Johnson to Kohli, no run short of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman gets solidly behind it and defends

Johnson to Kohli, no run Johnson's throw takes down Kohli and immediate apology from the bowler. Kohli pushes it down the pitch and moves out of the crease, the bowler is quick to fire it back at the stumps, but Kohli is in the way
Johnson to Kohli, no run a loose drive! He goes for the booming shot without really getting anywhere close to the ball.. beaten completely
Johnson to Kohli, no run on the pads, another uppish flick towards square leg
Johnson to Kohli, no run stays back and pushes the back of length delivery toward point

Johnson to Kohli, FOUR runs another loose drive! He pushes away from the body at this fuller delivery and gets a thick outside edge through the gap between gully and third slip. Johnson gives him more batting tips..Kohli shoots back too
Harris to Rahane, no run fuller on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and punches it to mid on
Harris to Rahane, no run stays back and defends the length delivery towards point
Harris to Rahane, no run stays in the crease and defends the back of length delivery to the off side
Harris to Rahane, FOUR runs too straight and Rahane drives it through the on side beautifully! Poor fielding at mid-on as he slides in too early.. it slides under his hands and runs away
Harris to Rahane, no run he comes forward and allows the ball to go through
Harris to Rahane, no run length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the back foot

Johnson to Kohli, no run dropped by first slip! Watson it is. Good delivery outside off, but Kohli is neither forward nor back, just pushes at it, gets a thick outside edge but Watson is not able to hold on to it as he dives low to his left. It wasn't too far from Haddin too.
Johnson to Kohli, no run length delivery on the stumps, defends it solidly down the pitch
Johnson to Kohli, no run stays in the crease as he defends the length delivery down the pitch
Johnson to Kohli, no run fuller and wider outside off, he leaves it alone this time
Johnson to Kohli, no run length delivery outside off, comes half forward and defends it to point
Johnson to Kohli, no run length delivery on the off, the batsman comes forward and defends
Harris to Rahane, FOUR runs wow! That is slapped with some power and timing. He spots the length early and whacks it through point
Harris to Rahane, no run length delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it down to mid-off
Harris to Rahane, FOUR runs poor delivery this time, it's on the pads and it's helped on its way to the fine-leg boundary
Harris to Rahane, no run he leans forward and punches the length delivery down to mid-on
Harris to Rahane, no run how close was that! Rahane looks to play the upper cut but makes no connection with it. Not too far from the edge
Harris to Rahane, 1 run he comes forward and tucks it through square leg for an easy single

Johnson to Rahane, 1 run short delivery, lures the batsman into a pull but he is not entirely in control of it, it drops well short of the fielder at deep square leg. The run brings the 150 of the stand
Johnson to Kohli, no run fuller and wider outside off, Kohli lunges forward and leaves it alone

Johnson to Kohli, 1 run top-edge lands short of Haddin! Bouncer on the body, Kohli goes for the pull but he is no position to play that shot, gets a top-edge towards backward square leg.. Haddin makes a run, dives forward but can't make it. Kohli's concentration is really shaky at the moment
Johnson to Rahane, no run now Rahane misses another upper cut! This is short on the body, Rahane sways out of line but still wants to play that shot over the keeper's head, makes no connection
Johnson to Rahane, 2 runs fuller delivery outside off, Rahane doesn't take his front foot forward but his body weight is forward, slices it through point
Johnson to Rahane, 1 run on the pads, this is neatly flicked to deep square leg. Rahane keeps strike
Harris to Rahane, no run length delivery outside off, Rahane leaves it alone
Harris to Rahane, 1 run fuller on off stumps, the batsman clips it off his pads through square leg
Harris to Kohli, no run length delivery on off, the batsman defends it solidly to the off side
Harris to Kohli, no run stays in the crease and defends the length delivery down the pitch
Harris to Kohli, 1 run walks across to the off side and punches the length delivery to wide mid-on
Harris to Rahane, FOUR runs he gets his shot at the third attempt! Arches back and ramps the short ball over the slip cordon
Johnson to Kohli, no run short ball again, the batsman ducks under it in time
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run stays back and dabs the back of length delivery to the off side for a quick single, has to dive at the other end to make it in time
Johnson to Rahane, 1 run length delivery, pushed to the off side for a quick single
Johnson to Kohli, 2 runs on the pads, he flicks it to deep midwicket for a couple
Johnson to Kohli, no run gets his front foot moving this time, comes closer to the stumps and punches the length delivery to mid-off
Johnson to Kohli, no run another short delivery at 145 kph, but Kohli ducks under it well in time

Watson to Rahane, no run stays in the crease and defends the length delivery to the off side
Watson to Rahane, no run he stays in the crease and pushes the length delivery tentatively to the off side

Watson to Rahane, FOUR runs he gets to his third century this year with a thick outside edge over gully! Not the ideal shot but he is a happy man, takes the helmet off and takes in the applause. What an innings this has been! It has come in double quick time.
Watson to Rahane, no run waits on the back foot and defends the length delivery down the pitch
Watson to Rahane, no run length delivery on the off side, comes forward and defends to off
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run length delivery on the stumps, defended to the off side
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run back of length delivery outside off, the batsman dabs it towards backward point
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run fuller delivery outside off, Kohli comes forward and lets it go through to the keeper
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run waits on the back foot and is a touch squared up as he looks to defend, plays it towards gully
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run short delivery but this is well down the leg side
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run length delivery outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
Watson to Rahane, no run back of length delivery outside off, he rises up with it and punches the length delivery to off
Watson to Rahane, 1 run quick single as Rahane drops it to the off side, Kohli is quick to respond and they complete it comfortably
Watson to Kohli, 2 runs on the pads, Kohli whips it through midwicket for a quick couple
Watson to Kohli, no run he leans forward and punches the length delivery down the pitch
Watson to Kohli, 1 run waits on the back foot and steers the back of length to the left of point, easy single for the batsman

Watson to Rahane, FOUR runs fantastic shot! He leans forward to this fuller delivery and times it crisply through cover.. That doesn't lose any momentum till it reaches the boundary. Superb timing there
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run he dabs the back of length delivery towards midwicket and scoots away for a single. That's the 100th runs this session
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run walks into this defensive shot and plays it solidly towards cover
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run shortish delivery on the body, Rahane arches back to play that upper cut again, but this comes in too far and hits him on the glove

Hazlewood to Rahane, FOUR runs now he takes the conventional approach to a short one.. This is rising up shoulder high and Rahane has his weight forward as he plays this cracking pull to deep midwicket
Hazlewood to Rahane, 1 run beautifully played! Another short one but this is outside off, Rahane arches back to steer it over first slip. The third-man is fine and cuts it off. Warner there
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run he moves to 98 with a dab towards midwicket and a quick single

Lyon to Kohli, FOUR runs he gets to his third century of the series with a typical Kohli shot! Whips this full delivery through extra cover, straightaway he knows he has done it. What a turnaround for him after that horrid tour to England!
Lyon to Kohli, no run stays back and defends the length delivery to the leg side
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run lunges forward and punches the length delivery down the ground to long on
Lyon to Rahane, no run waits on the back foot and defends the length ball to off
Lyon to Rahane, no run tossed up and a little slower, the batsman comes forward and defends
Lyon to Rahane, no run floated up to the batsman, Rahane defends it to the leg side
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run this cuts back from a length and smacks the thigh pad as Kohli plays from the crease
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run fuller delivery outside off, he comes forward and punches it to mid-off
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run gets inside the line of this shortish delivery, clips it through square leg for a single
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run length delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run short delivery on off stump, lacks zing, Rahane pulls it comfortably with a roll of wrists to square leg
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run he hops on the crease and defends the back of length delivery straight to cover
Harris to Kohli, no run back of length outside off, the batsman cuts it straight to point
Harris to Kohli, no run fuller delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to midwicket off the inside half of the bat
Harris to Kohli, no run stays on the back foot and defends the 132 kph delivery comfortably
Harris to Kohli, no run back of length delivery outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
Harris to Kohli, no run he leans into this length delivery and punches it down to mid-on
Harris to Kohli, no run back of length delivery outside off, dabbed to point off the back foot
Johnson to Rahane, 3 runs he rises up with this short delivery and dabs it through backward point, placed perfectly in the gap
Johnson to Kohli, no run back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to the leg side
Johnson to Kohli, no run length delivery wide outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
Johnson to Kohli, no run looks to pull this from off side but gets a bit hurried by the pace, ends up playing it towards midwicket without any timing
Johnson to Kohli, no run he comes forward and punches the length delivery down the pitch
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run back of length delivery on the pads, the batsman clips it to fine leg for an easy single
Harris to Kohli, no run bowls length in the channel, Kohli comes forward and defends the length delivery to the off side
Harris to Kohli, no run doesn't really come forward but defends the length delivery solidly to the off side
Harris to Kohli, no run stays in the crease and defends the length delivery down the pitch
Harris to Kohli, no run length delivery just outside off, the batsman defends it from the crease, towards midwicket
Harris to Kohli, 3 runs full and on the off stump, Kohli comes forward and pushes it through wide mid-on for three more. Not much power there, but he uses his wrists to pick the gap
Harris to Rahane, no run he comes forward and defends the length delivery towards cover
Johnson to Kohli, FOUR runs picks the short ball early and flat-bats this past a diving square-leg fielder to bring up the 200 of the stand. Mr Burns got a touch on that ball as he dived to his left

Johnson to Kohli, FOUR runs this is to the right of Mr Burns at square leg! The short balls are lacking zing and are being picked away for runs. This was played in the air, but he was in much better control
Johnson to Kohli, FOUR runs another short ball, this one is slapped away through midwicket for his third consecutive boundary. Fantastic pull shot
Johnson to Kohli, no run back of length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it to the off side
Johnson to Kohli, 3 runs he comes forward and punches the length delivery through the off side, neatly picks up the gap. This is turning out to be a big over. Johnson goes past his century
Johnson to Rahane, no run back of length on the body, Rahane pulls it to square leg
Harris to Kohli, 1 run he comes forward and punches this to mid-on, takes off for a quick single
Harris to Rahane, 1 run another quick single, this time to cover as Rahane pushes the fuller delivery in the gap, played it with soft hands
Harris to Kohli, no run length delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends it down the pitch
Harris to Kohli, no run he goes back and across and defends the short of length delivery down to mid-on
Harris to Kohli, no run bowls it full on the off stumps at 134 kph, the batsman comes forward and drives it to cover
Harris to Kohli, no run stays on the back foot and defends the length delivery from the crease

Johnson to Rahane, FOUR runs whoa!! Where did that come from! Rahane does to Johnson what Smith has been doing to the India bowlers. Clears his front leg out and flat bats it over cow corner. Smashing hit
Johnson to Rahane, no run tries to repeat the shot! But doesn't get the timing this time, places it straight to midwicket
Johnson to Rahane, no run moves to the leg side and gets a fuller delivery on the pads, the batsman defends it calmly to the leg side

Johnson to Rahane, FOUR runs moves to the leg side again and gets another fuller one, but this time, he creams it through mid-off. No follow through of the bat again, just sheer timing. It's like he is playing a T20
Johnson to Rahane, no run gives himself room again and punches the length delivery comfortably to cover
Johnson to Rahane, FOUR runs he is taking Johnson apart! Moves to the leg side and flat-bats this through midwicket for another boundary. Rahane looking to break Johnson here
Lyon to Kohli, no run tossed up outside off, the batsman punches it straight to mid-on
Lyon to Kohli, 2 runs comes forward and turns the flighted delivery away to square leg for a quick couple
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run flatter and on the pads, easy pickings for Kohli as he dabs this through square leg
Lyon to Rahane, 1 run goes deep in the crease and clips this turning delivery off his pads, down to fine leg
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run tossed up delivery from round the wicket, eased to long on for a single
Lyon to Rahane, 2 runs draws an outside edge off the batsman as Rahane pushes inside the line, but this rolls along harmlessly behind point
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run another quick single as Kohli dabs this short of length delivery towards mid-on with soft hands
Johnson to Rahane, 1 run stays in the crease and cracks the length delivery behind point for a single. There is a man in the deep
Johnson to Kohli, no run fuller delivery on the stumps, Kohli comes forward and drives it to cover
Johnson to Kohli, no run fuller delivery on off stump, Kohli comes forward and punches it to mid-on
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run the bat turns in his hand as he looks to play the drive but he is quick to call for the single to mid-on
Johnson to Rahane, no run he moves to the leg side and tries to run this down to third man, past the first slip fielder, but doesn't get the timing, straight to Watson at first slip, on the bounce
Lyon to Kohli, no run pushed through outside off, Kohli defends it off the back foot
Lyon to Kohli, no run comes forward and drives the tossed up delivery but can't beat Marsh at cover
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run same ball, but this one is driven past the non-striker with a wristy drive, long on does the fielding
Lyon to Rahane, no run leans forward and defends the tossed up delivery to the off side
Lyon to Rahane, no run pushed through wide outside off, fuller too, Rahane leaves it alone
Lyon to Rahane, 2 runs comes forward with his bat close to the pad, then times it through the gap at cover
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run length delivery on off, this is pushed to mid-off off the front foot, the first time he plays the bowler in the match
Hazlewood to Rahane, FOUR runs stands tall and cracks the back of length delivery through backward point. Huge gap there and Rahane has been timing them really well
Hazlewood to Rahane, 1 run now punches it to the right of point to pick up a quick single
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run he gets inside the line and works away the back of length delivery through square leg
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run he comes forward and leaves the wider delivery alone
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run he comes forward and defends the length delivery calmly to the off side
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run pushed through on the stumps, Kohli stays in the crease and tucks it to backward square leg

Lyon to Rahane, FOUR runs superb timing! The fielders are not interested in chasing that one. It's full and flighted, Rahane reaches out and drives it all along the ground through cover. That's 250 of the partnership
Lyon to Rahane, no run tossed up on the off stump line, the batsman comes forward and defends it solidly
Lyon to Rahane, 1 run he stays back and tucks this flatter delivery away to square leg
Lyon to Kohli, no run leans forward and smothers the spin on this flighted delivery
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run he comes forward and tucks it to long on for another easy single
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run short delivery outside off, Kohli swivels and drags it to the leg side but can't beat a diving Marsh at midwicket
Hazlewood to Kohli, 3 runs he leans forward and drives the length delivery crisply through cover, runs three more
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run he comes forward and punches the fuller delivery straight back at the bowler
Hazlewood to Rahane, 1 leg bye this one is slipping down the leg side, rolls on to fine-leg after hitting the pads. Those are your first extras in this innings
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run he comes forward and punches the length delivery down to mid-on
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run comes forward and pushes the length delivery to deep cover for a single
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run flatter outside off stumps, turns in a bit, Kohli waits on the back foot and steers it behind point
Lyon to Rahane, no run pushes this through outside off and Rahane misses the cut as it slides under his bat
Lyon to Rahane, FOUR runs he chooses the sweep this time and plays it superbly, cracks the flighted delivery down to deep backward square leg

Lyon to Rahane, OUT and there is the breakthrough! Rahane looks to repeat the sweep shot but this is much straighter and fuller from Lyon, he misses and his hit on the back pad. The umpire takes time and then raises his finger. Rahane gets a pat on the back from Kohli and a standing ovation from the crowd as he walks back. Superb innings from him.
Lyon to Rahul, 1 run comes forward and flicks the flighted delivery confidently past the short leg fielder for his first Test runs
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run tossed up on the stumps, the batsman tucks it through midwicket for a single
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run short of length ball just outside off, defended back towards the bowler
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run pitched up and just outside off, solid forward defensive towards cover
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run short of length ball around off stump, blocked towards the bowler
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run short of length angling in towards off stump, clipped towards midwicket for a single
Hazlewood to Rahul, no run short of length ball, Rahul gets well forward as he defends the ball towards cover
Hazlewood to Rahul, no run on middle and leg, tucked towards square leg by Rahul
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run drops it short as he bowls from round the wicket, played off the back foot towards midwicket
Lyon to Rahul, no run gets nicely forward to this over-the-wicket delivery, tapped back towards the bowler
Lyon to Rahul, no run gets well inside the crease this time as Lyon drops it a touch short, defended towards short leg
Lyon to Rahul, no run strides forward as he blocks this one
Lyon to Rahul, 2 runs dropped, KL Rahul skips down the track and tries a wristy loft, back leg in the air after he flicks that, should have been taken by Siddle at midwicket, he's been reprieved

Lyon to Rahul, OUT he's gone next ball, it was full and well outside off, hitting the rough as well, Rahul goes for an expansive sweep, top edges that towards backward square leg, simple catch and it is not put down this time, there's plenty of hype around Rahul, but he's played a couple of strange shots in his short debut innings
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run length ball is driven back towards the bowler
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run short of length ball is gently swatted towards midwicket
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run full and outside off, Dhoni is beat by that one
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run short of length ball on middle and off, pushed towards the bowler
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run huge appeal for lbw as Dhoni walks down the track and looks to thump that towards midwicket, struck just outside off, India still 114 behind
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run Dhoni jumps down the track once more, this time the ball is well outside off, MSD happy to leave
Lyon to Kohli, no run length ball from round the wicket, Kohli goes deep in the crease, defends to the leg side
Lyon to Kohli, no run length ball is tapped back towards the bowler
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run fuller, on middlem tucked past square leg
Lyon to Dhoni, no run driven off the front foot towards extra cover
Lyon to Dhoni, no run Lyon bowling over the wicket to Dhoni, this time the ball is pushed back by Dhoni towards the bowler
Lyon to Dhoni, no run gets a huge stride in as he defends that one
Johnson to Kohli, no run length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and punches it to mid-off
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run waits in the crease and pushes the back of length delivery through cover for a quick single
Johnson to Dhoni, no run he is stuck in the crease as he defends the length delivery back down the pitch
Johnson to Dhoni, no run outside edge as he pushes at this fuller delivery from the crease. This is angled across him but Dhoni is lucky that it doesn't carry
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run short delivery on the leg stump line, Dhoni swivels to pull it down fine leg to get off strike
Johnson to Kohli, no run fuller on the off stump, the batsman comes forward and punches it to mid-on
Lyon to Dhoni, no run he does a complete split there as he goes for the sweep and his front foot slips! That is some flexibility.. doesn't even flinch
Lyon to Dhoni, no run comes right forward and defends the tossed up delivery to off
Lyon to Dhoni, no run waits on the back foot and defends the flatter delivery to off
Lyon to Dhoni, FOUR runs stretches right forward and whacks this tossed up delivery with a powerful sweep, down to backward square leg boundary
Lyon to Dhoni, no run tossed up on the stumps, he pushes it to midwicket
Lyon to Dhoni, 3 runs full and flighted outside off, now Dhoni brings his heavy bat down and plays a cover drive.. It doesn't quite make it to the boundary though
Harris to Dhoni, no run loud appeal for lbw as Dhoni does his walk-down-the-pitch-to-play-across-the-line routine..That has hit him on the knee roll but the impact was outside the off
Harris to Dhoni, 1 run punched back to the bowler, who fires a throw at the striker's end. Dhoni waits for it to hit and the ricochet to deflect, then takes an easy single
Harris to Kohli, no run superb yorker from Harris, gets it to tail in towards the toes, Kohli falls over as he digs this out towards midwicket
Harris to Kohli, no run comes forward to this inswinging delivery and plays it towards midwicket
Harris to Kohli, 1 run back of length delivery on the stumps, Kohli calmly clips it down to fine leg
Harris to Dhoni, 2 runs he reaches out with the bat - his front foot much behind the bat - and punches the fuller delivery through cover.
Watson to Kohli, no run length delivery at 126 kph, some inswing on that, Kohli defends it solidly to the off side
Watson to Kohli, no run cuts back in from a back of length, the batsman dabs it towards off and thinks about a single but Dhoni sends him back
Watson to Kohli, no run definitely some light reverse for Watson, swings in towards middle from an off stump line, the batsman defends it comfortably
Watson to Kohli, no run keeps it around the off stump line, Kohli comes forward and defends it down the pitch
Watson to Kohli, no run goes full and gets some swing, Kohli is watchful, he clips it straight to midwicket
Watson to Kohli, no run he waits on the back foot and defends the length delivery towards mid-on
Harris to Dhoni, no run he comes forward and defends the length delivery to the off side
Harris to Dhoni, no run comes forward to this fuller delivery, the batsman comes forward and punches it to mid-off
Harris to Dhoni, no run walks across to the off side and tucks the length delivery to midwicket
Harris to Ashwin, no run he looks solid as he comes forward and defends the length delivery
Harris to Ashwin, no run a loud appeal for lbw as Harris gets it to tail in big time and rap the pads. The umpire says it was doing too much and missing leg stump

Watson to Kohli, FOUR runs some inswing for Watson but this is superb timing from Kohli! Just punches it through midwicket and that races away. He takes his helmet off as he reaches 150 for the first time in Tests
Watson to Kohli, no run comes forward and defends the length delivery down the pitch
Watson to Kohli, no run leans forward and punches the length delivery to mid-off
Watson to Kohli, no run back of length on the stumps, Kohli defends it with solid back-foot defence
Watson to Kohli, no run keeps it tight and on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends
Watson to Kohli, no run some more wobble from Watson but Kohli is solid as he defends that down the pitch
Harris to Ashwin, no run comes forward and defends the length delivery solidly down the pitch

Harris to Ashwin, OUT and here's another one! Harris takes a tumbling catch in his follow through. Ashwin drives at this fuller delivery and is not able to keep it down, Harris stretches his right hand out, is not able to cling on. Luckily the ball doesn't get away from him and he is able to make a second grab at that
Harris to Shami, no run big outside edge as he comes forward to the length delivery, it drops short of gully through
Harris to Shami, no run length delivery wide outside off, he leaves it alone this time
Harris to Shami, no run floats it up on the off stump line, Shami comes forward and defends it down the pitch
Harris to Shami, 1 wide digs this one short but it flies over the batsman's left shoulder
Harris to Shami, no run back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it down the pitch
Watson to Kohli, no run gets this to tail in from outside off, Kohli comes forward and punches it to midwicket
Watson to Kohli, no run he looks to flick this fuller delivery through wide mid-on, uses a lot of bottom hand, but Johnson dives to his right and cuts it off
Watson to Kohli, 1 run superb straight drive, another one with a lot of wristwork but this hits the stumps at the non-striker's end and deflects to the off side
Watson to Shami, FOUR runs short and outside off, Shami doesn't mind it, slapping it over gully to pick up four runs
Watson to Shami, no run he comes forward and punches the length delivery neatly to cover
Watson to Shami, no run fuller delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and slices it to point
Johnson to Kohli, no run back of length delivery at 119 kph, Kohli comes forward and dabs it towards point
Johnson to Kohli, no run reaches out to this fuller delivery and slices it in the air through point, but the man is standing in the deep
Johnson to Kohli, no run he stays in the crease and steers the fuller delivery to deep point
Johnson to Kohli, no run looks for the cutter from a leg stump line but this slides down leg side
Johnson to Kohli, FOUR runs be a u ti ful!! He comes forward and punches the length delivery on-the-up, right through the gap at cover
Johnson to Kohli, FOUR runs now goes over the infield at cover! Not much timing there but that teases two fielders all the way
Hazlewood to Shami, no run length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends it down the pitch
Hazlewood to Shami, no run looks to guide it down to third man but makes no connection
Hazlewood to Shami, 1 run he comes forward and pushes it to cover for a quick single to give Kohli the strike
Hazlewood to Kohli, no run goes back and across and defends the back of length delivery down the pitch
Hazlewood to Kohli, 1 run too straight this time, Kohli clips it off his hips and picks up a single to deep backward square leg
Hazlewood to Shami, no run defends the back of length delivery to cover
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run he wanted two but gets only one, doesn't get the timing as he chips this fuller delivery over cover. The fielder at mid-off keeps them to a single
Johnson to Shami, no run gets this one to zip past the outside edge. Shami was trying on block it but it keeps going away with the angle
Johnson to Shami, 1 run almost plays the slower ball back in the hands of Johnson. What more, Johnson ends up booting it away towards square leg and Shami steals a single
Johnson to Kohli, no run back of length on the stumps, defended towards mid-on
Johnson to Kohli, no run back of length on the stumps, he stays back and defends it solidly down the pitch
Johnson to Kohli, no run looks for the big whack down the ground, throws a hammer on this fuller delivery but the mid-on fielder cuts it off
Lyon to Shami, 3 runs short and wide and even Shami is not going to miss out on those, he cracks it off the back foot and picks up three through cover point

Lyon to Kohli, 1 run tossed up on the middle, Kohli smashes it in the air past the umpire for a single down to long-on. Lyon tries to catch it but it's too quick.. Dharmasena dives in the other direction to get away from it
Lyon to Shami, no run flatter on off, defended down the pitch
Lyon to Shami, no run more solid defence from the batsman, pushes it to off
Lyon to Shami, no run he leans forward and defends the length delivery to silly point
Lyon to Shami, no run floats it up from round the wicket, Shami defends it off the front foot
Johnson to Kohli, FOUR runs whoa!! Kohli sees length and smashes it over mid-off with a powerful swing. Blows Johnson a little kiss too
Johnson to Kohli, 1 run back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman clips it to fine leg
Johnson to Shami, no run back of length on off, Shami gets behind the line and defends
Johnson to Shami, no run he tries to cover the line but this keeps going away from him, beats the outside edge
Johnson to Shami, no run stays on the back foot and defends the shortish delivery towards point
Johnson to Shami, no run fires it on the stumps from round the wicket, Shami gets solidly behind and keeps it out
Lyon to Kohli, no run tossed up from over the wicket, the batsman defends it down the pitch
Lyon to Kohli, no run full and flighted on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it down the pitch to the bowler
Lyon to Kohli, no run he stretches forward and defends the flatter delivery to off
Lyon to Kohli, no run tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it down the pitch
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run fires a quicker one on the pads, Kohli takes it on the full and flicks it to deep square leg
Lyon to Shami, no run he leans forward and defends the tossed up delivery to the off side
Johnson to Kohli, no run bowls length on the stumps from round the wicket, the batsman pushes it down the pitch

Johnson to Kohli, OUT and he gets the big wicket! After 29 overs of toil, Johnson has something to show. But check that out for a catch from Haddin. He dives full length to his right and plucks it in front of first slip. It was going straight into Watson's hands. Kohli tried to chase that full and wide delivery, but got a thick outside edge.
Johnson to Yadav, no run digs it in short and aims at the ribs, Umesh gets up a wake up call as he fends it to the leg side. No short leg in place
Johnson to Sharma, no run back of length outside off, Ishant hops on the crease and defends it to the off side
Johnson to Sharma, no run similar delivery to the one that got Umesh, but Ishant arches back to allow it to pass it through
Harris to Shami, no run fuller delivery that hits the pads but this is slipping down the leg side
Harris to Shami, 1 run swings across the line at this fuller delivery and picks up a single to deep midwicket
Harris to Sharma, no run gets some away movement from a length, squares up the batsman and beats the outside edge
Harris to Sharma, no run stays on the back foot and defends the length delivery to the off
Harris to Sharma, no run fuller delivery on the stumps, some inward movmemnt, Ishant pushes it to cover
Harris to Sharma, no run bowls it a bit slower and further up to the batsman, Ishant keeps his eyes on it and jams it out
Johnson to Shami, no run he stays on the back foot and pushes the back of length delivery to point
Johnson to Shami, no run sharp bouncer on the stumps, Shami does well to sway out of the line
Johnson to Shami, 2 runs pushes at it away from the body and in the air through the gap at cover but turns down the single
Johnson to Shami, no run comes forward and defends the length delivery to point

10.43 am It took only two overs to remove the last two wickets. Australia have managed a handy 65-run lead and only three runs were added after the dismissal of Kohli. The last seven wickets could only add 56 runs.
Innings Start
Jared: "Brad Haddin sledging Kohli by shouting "It's all about you!" at him on TV. The irony is palpable."
